column7: In-depth exploration of global urbanization. Using a comparative regional approach, discuss the recent history of global urbanization, dissect its problems, and offer possible solutions. Approximately ten major regions of the world will be examined, exploring the significant  urban patterns and processes, built and natural environments, and social, economic, and cultural landscapes of each.
column10: Grand Challenge-Sustainability, Social & Beh Sci - Soc Sci, and Cultural Studies - Western course.
